creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: tall, square basket with open weave; minimal horizontal reinforcements; square bamboo handle; no cylinder in box
text: The body of this work is composed of strong, vertical lines of widely spaced madake bamboo that allow light to pass through. An unsplit piece of kurochiku or black bamboo was used for the handle.
title: Tall Square Flower Basket with Handle
